statements.text: Healthcare should be more affordable and accessible for everyone
We should invest significantly more in renewable energy sources
Education funding should be increased at all levels
Income tax rates should be more progressive for higher earners
Public transportation should be expanded and subsidized
Criminal justice reform should focus on rehabilitation over punishment
Immigration policies should be more welcoming to refugees
Military spending should be reduced in favor of domestic programs
Voting rights protections should be strengthened
Tech companies should face stronger privacy regulations
Minimum wage should be raised significantly
Climate change action should be a top government priority
Police departments need more accountability and oversight
College tuition should be free for all students
Gun ownership regulations should be strengthened
Social safety net programs should be expanded
Renewable energy should replace fossil fuels as quickly as possible
Mental health services should be more widely available
Infrastructure investments should prioritize green technologies
Abortion access should be protected as a constitutional right
